name: Fall of Vestia
description:
This game was created for the Wowie Jam 4.0, in this game you control a planet fending off endless enemies while and "AI" builds support stations around the planet to help you. Game is really simple, using your mouse to aim and the left mouse button to shoot

This is one I really intend on coming back around to fixing up after the jam is done, but it's gonna be awhile before I get around to it
